title: Clonazepam
summary: Clonazepam, sold under the brand Klonopin among others, is a medication used to prevent and treat seizures, panic disorder, anxiety, and the movement disorder known as akathisia.[5] It is a tranquilizer of the benzodiazepine class.[5] It is taken by mouth.[5] Effects begin within one hour and last between six and twelve hours.[8]
